text:
service amanda
{
        disable = no
        flags           = IPv4
        flags           = IPv6
        socket_type     = dgram
        protocol        = udp
        wait            = no
        user            = amanda
        group           = disk
        groups          = yes
        server          = /usr/libexec/amanda/amandad
        #server_args     = -auth=bsdtcp amdump amindexd amidxtaped
        server_args     = -auth=bsd amdump amindexd amidxtaped
}
